details:

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wp_reservation_entries ( id int(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, entries longtext NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY id (id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4
